TopicTitle: If I did a series on teaching my sister how to KSP, would you watch it?

Articles.Content:
How do you KSP - My sister!

I'm thinking of starting a KSP series teaching my KSP-clueless sister how to make planes, make orbit, and land on the Mun (and maybe go to another planet idk!)

Would you watch some of it?

Edited March 29, 2014 by Avera9eJoe
Hmmm, yeah sure I'll watch it, don't forget to post it in Live From Mission Control
Probably not, although I like the idea. I get frustrated when Kurt messes up stuff and just shout at my computer screen, I can't imagine how annoyed I'd be at watching a complete beginner
Sounds good you 2. I'll be making 2 videos definitely and then working from there if people really like them.
